name: Vedra Holdings LLC
description: PRICE LAB optimizes the pricing strategy and communication in physical stores for retailers through a SaaS and hardware solution. It replaces paper prices on shelves with digital price tags that are updated in real time through a cloud platform.
one_liner: PRICE LAB optimizes the pricing strategy and communication in physical stores for retailers through a SaaS and hardware solution. It replaces paper prices on shelves with digital price tags that are updated in real time through a cloud platform.
